actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide additional district court judges for the Southern District of Florida.

summary.text: Directs the President to appoint, by and with the advice and consent of the Senate, a specified number of additional district judges to the United States District Court for the Southern District of Florida.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 28 of the United States Code to provide additional district court judges for the Southern District of Florida.
